original_title: Welcome to the Club - Part One
overview: In the early 90â€™s, a culture was brewing in abandoned warehouses, undergrounds and all age nightclubs; thousands of kids were drawn to Hollywood. Although alcohol was not served to the under twenty one, it was compensated by the immense availability of recreational drugs. These young adults hit the dance floor on a weekly basis, others however, reveled to be part of the darker side of Hollywood. Many young, straight, gay, bi men and women who felt this was the place they could call home. as they struggled with their identity and drug use. These are their untold stories that have woven the fabric of the dance culture in Hollywood.
title: Welcome to the Club - Part One
